Natural Scenting: Use natural ingredients like flowers, herbs, and spices to create a pleasant scent. For example, you can use lavender, rosemary, and cinnamon to create a warm and relaxing fragrance.

Essential Oils: Essential oils are highly concentrated oils that are extracted from plants. You can use these oils to create your own fragrances. For example, you can use lavender essential oil to create a relaxing scent or peppermint essential oil to create a refreshing scent.

Candle Making: You can make your own candles using natural ingredients like beeswax, coconut oil, and essential oils. You can also add natural colors to the candles to make them more visually appealing.
DIY Sprays: You can create your own sprays using natural ingredients like water, vinegar, and essential oils. You can also add natural colors to the sprays to make them more visually appealing.

Herbal Tea: You can brew your own herbal tea using natural ingredients like chamomile, lavender, and peppermint. You can also add natural sweeteners like honey or maple syrup to make the tea more enjoyable.
